name: R-Type Tactics II: Operation Bitter Chocolate
name_original: R-Type Tactics II: Operation Bitter Chocolate
description:
R-Type Tactics II: Operation Bitter Chocolate is a strategy game developed by Irem. It was originally released in 2009. It was published by IREM.
R-Type Tactics II: Operation Bitter Chocolate is available on PSP.
Yuki Iwai scored the game.
